DESC.PARA: An ionized absorber based on that of Done et al. (1992, ApJ 395, 275) and developed by Magdziarz & Zdziarski. See also Zdziarski et al. (1995, ApJ 438, L63). Photoionization rates are from Reilman & Manson (1979, ApJS 40, 815), who employ the Hartree-Slater approximation (accurate to about 5%), and recombination rates are from Shull & Steenburg (1982, ApJS 48, 95). The cross-sections are extrapolated with E^-3 above 5 keV. The abundances are set up by the set_xsabund command.
This is a multiplicative model component.

ROW.DATA: hydrogen column in units of 10^22 cm^-2
absorber ionization state (L/nR^2), see Done et al. (1992)
iron abundance relative to that defined by the set_xsabund command
